parameter.name: numberLength
parameter.description: Minimum length of the invoice number (to be filled with leading zeros).

parameter.name: supplyDate
parameter.description: Supply/delivery date of the products of the invocie.

parameter.name: discountDate
parameter.description: Cash discount date of the invocie.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Label text to describe the project.

parameter.name: netGross
parameter.description: Price basis (gross or net prices) of the invocie.

parameter.name: quote
parameter.description: Currency quote (for conversion into standard currency).

parameter.name: paymentTypes
parameter.description: List (separated by comma) of all accepted payment types.

parameter.name: existingInvoiceId
parameter.description: The ID of the corrected invoice, if it is an invoice correction.

parameter.name: offerId
parameter.description: The ID of the estimate, if the invoice was created from an estimate.

parameter.name: confirmationId
parameter.description: The ID of the confirmation, if the invoice was created from a confirmation.

parameter.name: recurringId
parameter.description: The ID of the recurring, if the invoice was created from a recurring.

parameter.name: invoiceItems
parameter.description: Array of invoice items to be added to the invoice.
